pages.text: The $(item)Container Key$() might prove a pretty useful utility to those keen on protecting their belongings. By $(thing)Shift-Right-Clicking$() on any container (eg. Chest, Furnace, ...) it will be locked and can only be opened again using this $(thing)one specific$() key until one chooses to unlock it again. This can be done just as easily by $(thing)Shift-Right-Clicking$() with the key again.
One should keep in mind however, that, to those so inclined, overcoming this protection should prove trivial by simply destroying the container in question.
